description.translate: Is'not because I'm drunk, yo're go'uing turelec me.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§7Jaja\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7C'pa parsk jui bourré, que tu vam'faire la lorame\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Is'not because I'm drunk, yo're go'uing turelec me.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7SPD§c-1 §7HUN§c-3 §7LUC§c-2\"}"]}}
